name: Rita Lamar
text: I've always had a pretty good experience with them, but here lately they've not had enough drivers and just randomly shut down. Call the store today after being unable to order online and the voicemail says that they are closed. Not sure if that's permanent or just today?

name: Victoria Gibson
text: I used to love this location. They used to be very prompt and had great customer service. But now? They barely ever have a delivery driver and they donâ€™t tell you that until youâ€™ve already been waiting for your food for 30 mins or more. I really hope they get some people in there that can run a business before they close down.

name: Izetta Ferguson
text: Friendly staff, no wait in person. The app is USELESS! Each time I have tried to use the app, I end up giving up after many tries. Speaking with someone at the call center is a horrible experience as well. It seems it is best to either call the store directly or go inside.

name: Shanti Nettles
text: Thomas took great care of me! I love the p-zones.

name: aaron parker
text: Morons work at this location. Called in for a delivery order. Fourty minutes later some genius named Thomas called me to say they didnt have a delivery driver. Even for pizza hut this is just plain sad. Owners should fire everyone and start over

name: George Nobles
text: We all know what to expect in terms of quality when it comes to pizza hut. I do love the stuffed crust though. This location, however, always manages to screw something up. Poor service, horrible food. I'd go to little Ceasars  before I go â€¦More

name: Adam Strong
text: Guy on phone had no idea what he was doing. Put on hold several times to check on soda. In the end I got no soda. Pizza looked as if they were running out of cheese. Delivery drive called from across the street claiming my address was â€¦More

name: Michael Stephens
text: Ate lunch inside.   No fountain drinks.   No ice.   Service was good and the food tasted good.   But the place looks like it's one step away from closing.

name: De Mock
text: Store was shut down. No reason given

name: Abel Cullen
text: Good pizza in town  and good service

name: Brandi Lee
text: Current Mood: I ordered online, pasta and breadsticks. Something that does not take long to make. It's been 75 mins and my online tracker still says "we've recieved your order". I called and they said they only had 1 driver and if it was â€¦More

name: Jessica Matthews
text: My husband and I and our two kids went in there and hopes to sit down and enjoy a pizza. But even though it's a fantastic location for Pizza Hut it has now become very run down. No server which still wasn't a big deal we didn't mind that. â€¦More

name: Jennifer Gethers
text: Good pizza in town service could be a little bit better.

name: Marcus Cremering
text: Hyams has one of the best garden and plant selections in the Charleston area. The customer service is great. The extreamly knowledgeable staff is able to help with ideas as well as solutions to any problems you may have planning  your projects or questions about individual plants trees shrubs ect.

name: Victor McKelvey
text: Awesome food and superb customer service

name: Rashad Mathis
text: GOOD FOOD GREAT SERVICE

name: Bobby Bentz
text: great pizza, great staff

name: Michael Gasser
text:
Deliveries are late 100% of the time. Expect about 30 minutes later that told.

5 star reviews are not to be trusted here...

name: Colleen Noonan
text: Got here with 4 hungry kids at 10pm after seeing the James Island Christmas lights. Walked in and was told we could not dine in. That they were not taking any more customers. Store didnt close for another 2 hrs! As was posted on their door, â€¦More

name: Jason Kangeter
text: The staff is always friendly. The food is excellent!! Ian and Jason are always helpful and make me feel like a vauled customer

name: Edmond S
text: Haven't had a pizza from Pizza Hut in quite a while... and now I remember why!!! DISGUSTING!!! ENDED UP IN THE GARBAGE ALONG WITH THE CHEESE BREAD. $7.99 LARGE PIZZA ENDED UP COSTING ME $21.00 with the tip.

name: AVAKINGOD YOBOIKING
text: Pizza smells very good

name: David Barabas
text: Ordered a couple pizzas for carry out leaving Cosgrove area of West Ashley, and by the time I got there they were ready and I was in and out so fast. Fabulous and friendly service!

name: Raiden Osamu
text: Constantly gets orders wrong and the delivery drivers have terrible customer service. The better choice is Famularis or Paisanos.

name: Chad Bolt
text: Pizza was great. Dine in experience was awesome. Prompt service, tasty food, and friendly staff.

name: Tanya Maese Leach
text: I ordered a pepperoni lovers pizza with light cheese. And received a meat lovers. Highly disappointed with the service. Pizza Hut used to mean quality. .... itâ€™s not the same anymore. No wonder this place has such bad reviews.

name: jason Reynolds
text: Northwood pizza hut is worth the drive.

name: Leslie Cargile
text: Usually pretty good, sometimes a little late but onlyvon super busy nights

text: Was refused with empty dinning room. Was told they could not serve us when they were open for two more hours.

name: Kenneth Hamby
text: The pizza is good but the service is very poor.

name: Brandon Newsome
text: Always great pizza anytime

name: Ater Striga
text: Good pizzas, great staff, especially John and drew. He threw in a free order of cheese sticks because I come in all the time.

name: Rebecca
text: Horrible service and pizza/breadsticks were so raw that they were doughy and inedible. The person taking my order entered my information incorrectly so many times that they froze my debit card.
